modName: Nightingale Blade n Bow - Dark Brotherhood Elite Edition
summary: Tired of the old nightingale blade and bow? I\'ve re-textured them to suit the dark brotherhood style!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2d8rvv4.png[/IMG]

Tired of the ancient-like nightingale blade?
Bored of the bland nightingale bow?

Then get this mod, it completely revamps the texture into a world of colour and also, as a plus, matches my armor set, and my shadowmere set!
Which you can find here: 

SM: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2591
Armor: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2583

Enjoy!

Please give constructive criticism and comment.
Endorsements are also appreciated!
author: Snake
